dcterms:creator: Qinbin Li
Yiqun Diao
Quan Chen
Bingsheng He
dcterms:description: The CIFAR-10 dataset contains 60,000 data samples, including 50,000 training samples and 10,000 test samples, categorized into 10 classes. It is widely used in the domain of image classification and was utilized in this paper to evaluate the effectiveness of the proposed GANcrop defense mechanism against backdoor attacks in federated learning.
dcterms:title: Cifar10
